services.title: Strength Training
services.description: Build muscle, learn form correction and improve overall power using structured barbell programs.

services.title: Fat Loss Program
services.description: HIIT, functional conditioning and guided nutrition to help you burn fat safely and effectively.

services.title: Personal Coaching
services.description: One-on-one coaching sessions with certified trainers focusing on your individual goals.

services.title: CrossFit / HIIT
services.description: Intense high-energy workouts combining functional training, speed and endurance.

services.title: Yoga & Mobility
services.description: Improve flexibility, posture, breathing and recovery with guided yoga sessions.

services.title: Transformation Challenge
services.description: Complete body transformation plans including diet, workouts and weekly checkups.

trainers.name: Priya Nair
trainers.specialization: Nutrition planning, fat loss coaching, women's fitness

reviews.name: Arjun M
reviews.comment: Best gym experience ever! The trainers are supportive and the programs are well structured.
